public boolean nonWild() { if (absX >= 3083 && absX <= 3088 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3525) { return true; } else { return false; } } Copy And Paste That In.

REMEMBER TO Hit “Tab” Not Space.

item.title: Making Safe zone in wildy?
item.dc:creator: @Alec_XI Alec XI
item.description:
@Alec_XI wrote:

public boolean nonWild() {
if (absX >= 3083 && absX <= 3088 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3525 || absX >= 3147 && absX <= 3183 && absY >= 3657 && absY <= 3689)) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

That might work… (Give me credits somewhere, will ya. AND Woot! First post!)

Read full topic

hey,

	if (absX >= 3083 && absX <= 3088 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3525) {
			return true;
		} else {

}
